sections.summary:
Enthusiastic, and outgoing Customer Service Associate proficient at building positive relationships with new and existing customers by offering
superior customer service. Skilled in establishing rapport with clients. Self-motivated with exceptional communication and computer capabilities.
Highlights
Exceptional communication skills
Cash handling accuracy
Upselling techniques
Banking and financial services background
Quick learnerÂ
Organized
Merchandising
Detail-oriented
Credit card processing
Excellent multi-tasker
Stocking
Display design
Strategic sales knowledge
Flexible schedule
Skilled problem solver
Proficient in MS Office
Proficient in cash management

Company Name City , State Sales 10/2014 to 09/2015

Folded and arranged garments in attractive displays.
Recommended alternative items if product was out of stock.
